channel.title: Earthmoving Equipment on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Earthmoving Equipment on Universal

item.title: E00266
item.description: Doosan 130LCV, Cab with airconditioning, mono boom, 3.05 Mtr. stick, hammer lines, quick coupler, undercarriage on average 75% remaining, 700mm triple grouser pads, GP digging bucket, work lights, 14.000 Kgs operating weight. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E00293
item.description: Caterpillar 769D, 40 ton rigid off-road dump truck with cab fire damage, 3408E Cat engine which is not damaged, bodylinders, retarder, 18.00-33 tyres which are 70% on average. Dump truck is easy to repair.

item.title: E00360
item.description: Komatsu WA600-1L Wheel loader, E-ROPS cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder Komatsu SD170 engine with 415 HP, 40.400Kg operating weight, 5.4M3 bucket, 4 step powershift transmission, 35⁄65-33 tyres. Machine is in “as is” running condition and will be sold for spares or repairs. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E00952
item.description: Caterpillar D4H dozer, parts machine. Final drives & transmission available. Please contact us for parts / component price & availability.

item.title: E02296
item.description: Caterpillar 345CL, Excavator pipelayer,10 units available, tipping point 88 ton, 9.2mtr. A-frame boom, cab with heater and airco. Braden planetary dual brake lifting and deriking winch, 2 speed Rexroth hydr. piston motors, 19mm rope diameter, hydr. boom stop, anti-two block system, hydraulic joystick control, 3 side working range, can be transported in one load. Machine is in as new condition. For sales and rental info please contact: Tel. +31653853392 or E-mail: John@deltamachinery.

item.title: E02311
item.description: Caterpillar 345CL, Excavator pipelayer,10 units available, tipping point 88 ton, 9.2mtr. A-frame boom, cab with heater and airco. Braden planetary dual brake lifting and deriking winch, 2 speed Rexroth hydr. piston motors, 19mm rope diameter, hydr. boom stop, anti-two block system, hydraulic joystick control, 3 side working range, can be transported in one load. Machine is in as new condition. For sales and rental info please contact: Tel. +31653853392 or E-mail: John@deltamachinery.

item.title: E02562
item.description: Caterpillar D5B, E-rops Cab, Cat 3306DI engine with 105HP (78kW), semi U-blade with tilt, 3 speed powershift transmission, drawbar, cutting edge 70% remaining, undercarriage on average 80% remaining, new carrier rollers, new sprockets, 560mm pads, 11.500 Kgs operating weight. Machine has new paint, is workshop tested and is in very good and clean condition.

item.title: E02943
item.description: Komatsu GD530A-1, Low profile E-rops cab, 6 cylinder turbocharged Komatsu diesel engine, powershift transmission, 12ft (3.65 Mtr) moldboard, new cutting edge, centershift, hydr. tipcontrol, scarifier, rear ripper with full set of new shanks, engine enclosures, 14.00-24 tyres 70%. Machine has new paint and is in very clean condition. Inspections are welcome. All manuals are available.

item.title: E02963
item.description: Caterpillar 938G, E-rops cab, 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar 3126 engine with 161HP (120kW), 4 speed automatic powershift transmission, bucket capacity 2.50 M3, 20.5-25 tyres on average 40% remaining, front and rear work lights. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome. GP bucket with cutting edge available at extra costs.

item.title: E03169
item.description: Ex army Caterpillar 988B 4x4 forklift, Cabin with ROPS & heater, Caterpillar 3408T diesel powered engine 393 HP. Direct injection 65 degree V8 turbo diesel engine. Variable timing fuel system. Power shift transmission. 24 volt direct electric starting system. Full hydraulic steering system with center point frame articulation. Operating weight w/o tophandler 52 ton. 25 ton lifting capacity. Can Stack 20 to 40 Ft containers two high. Top handler attachment. Tire size 35/65R33.

item.title: E03222
item.description: EPE PL95H, Hydrostatic pipelayers,10 units available, CE marked, 95 ton lifting capacity, Caterpillar C13 Tier IIIA engine 440HP, Linde hydrostatic transmission,10 km/h max speed, 9.0mtr. A frame boom, 2 Braden planetary dual brake winches, 2 speed Rexroth hydr. motors, 19mm rope, hydr. joystick control. For more info please contact John at Delta Pipeline Machinery: E-mail: John@deltamachinery.nl Phone: +31 888 966 966

item.title: E03482
item.description: New and Unused Caterpillar 330D LN, Cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C9 ACERT Technology engine with 268HP (200kW), mono boom, 2.15 Mtr stick, hammer lines, check valves, Cat bucket with teeth, 600mm triple grouser shoes, full set of track guides, work lights, 37.000 Kgs operating weight, CE marked. Machine is immediately available! Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E03698
item.description: Caterpillar D7G, E-rops cab, Cat 3306 engine, 3 speed powershift transmission, semi U blade/tilt, 610mm pads, undercarriage 75% remaining, drawbar. Machine comes straight out of work and is in ex job site condition. Rear ripper or rear pulling winch available at extra cost. Machine can be painted at extra cost.

item.title: E03991
item.description: Caterpillar SS-250B soil stabiliser, enclosed cab, ROPS, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat 3406 engine, 3 speed hydrostatic transmission, speed meters miles and KM, 2WD, front and rear steering, tyres front 28L-26, tyres rear 14.9R24, rotor width 240Cm, rotor diameter 120Cm, tips on average 90% remaining (some replaced), PTO driven rotor. Machine comes straight out of work, has new paint and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04269
item.description: Caterpillar D4E fitted with Midwestern hydraulic pipelayer kit, Caterpillar 3304 engine with 75HP (56kW), ROPS, hydraulic boom and hook winches, rubber boom protection, operating weight approx. 11.000 Kgs, wire ropes in good condition, undercarriage on average 75% remaining. Machine comes straight from job-site and is in very good and clean condition. Machine for sale or rent, subject to terms and conditions. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04333
item.description: Caterpillar 930 Ex-Army wheel loader, Cab, 4 cylinder Cat 3304 engine with 100HP (75kW), powershift transmission, 20.5R25 Michelin tyres 75% remaining, GP bucket with teeth, engine enclosures, rear counter weight, drawbar, 9.620 Kgs. operating weight. Machine has new paint, very low hours and is in very good technical and optical condition. This is one of the nicest 930’s which is available on the market!

item.title: E04403
item.description: Massey Ferguson 575, 2-door cab, 3-gearlevels, 3-point linkage, PTO, hydr. spoolvalves, 7.50-18 front tyres, 13.6-28 rear tyres. Tractor is in ex farm- and clean condition.

item.title: E04467
item.description: Available for rent 20 units Caterpillar 594H S/N# 96V sideboom / pipelayers. All units are frame up rebuilds or fully repaired with servo controlled wet deck conversions, equipped with Braden - Paccar winches with 2 speed Bosch Rexroth hydr. motors, Kawasaki hydr. main pumps, Pat Kruger LML safe load system, Certified ROPS & FOPS fitted, all work orders and pictures of repairs & hydr. conversion available upon request. Tractor has D353 engine 410HP, 3 speed power-shift transmission and drawbar.

item.title: E04479
item.description: Caterpillar 422E Backhoe Loader, E-rops cab with airconditioning, Cat 3054C Non-electronic turbocharged engine with 94HP (69kW), 4WD, 4 speed transmission, max. speed 40 Km/Hr, hydrostatic steering system, 4-in-1 bucket with teeth and flip-over forks, hydr. extendable stick, operating weight 7.210 Kgs, 12.5⁄80-18 front tyres & 16.9-28 rear tyres, front & rear work lights. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition.

item.title: E04488
item.description: Caterpillar D7G Ex-Army dozer, Machine has 462 Hrs from new! O-rops cab with sweeps, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat 3306DI engine with 200HP (149kW), semi U blade/tilt, 3 speed powershift transmission, undercarriage 95% remaining, 610mm pads, rear pulling winch, engine enclosures, new seat, 22.500 Kgs operating weight. Very clean machine!

item.title: E04533
item.description: Caterpillar 990H Wheel Loader, E-rops cab with airconditioning, manufactured in 2005, first sold in 2012, V12 Turbocharged Aftercooled Cat C27 ACERT Technology engine with 687HP (512kW), EPA compliant, 3 speed powershift transmission, joystick steering, Rock bucket with teeth, rated payload 16.500 Kgs, operating weight 78.000 Kgs, central grease system, 45/65R38 Michelin tyres on average 85% remaining, work lights. Machine comes straight out of work and is in very clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04537
item.description: Caterpillar 336EL, E-rops cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat C9.3 ATAAC engine with 300HP (224kW), Tier 4 Interim, EPA, mono boom, 3.90 Mtr stick, GP Cat bucket with new teeth, hydr. quick coupler, 75% undercarriage, 850mm triple grouser pads, new sprockets, new top rollers, work lights, rear view camera, operating weight 36.100 Kgs, CE marked. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04539
item.description: Caterpillar 336EL, E-rops cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat C9.3 ATAAC engine with 300HP (224kW), Tier 4 Interim, EPA, mono boom, 3.20 Mtr stick, GP bucket with new teeth, bucket width 1.40 Mtr, hammer lines, 80% undercarriage, 850mm triple grouser pads, work lights, rear view camera, operating weight 36.100 Kgs, CE marked. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04561
item.description: Caterpillar D8T Dozer, E-rops cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C15 ACERT Technology engine with 359HP (268kW), Tier 4 Interim, EPA, 4 barrel SS-ripper with hydr. pin puller, differential steering, wrist control steering, front & rear work lights, rear view camera. Machine comes straight out of work and is in very clean condition. Currently located in Houston Texas, USA. Machine is available for sale or rent, subject to terms and conditions.

item.title: E04618
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Sold new in 2007, only 201 Hrs from new! Machine is in as-new condition, Low profile E-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean condition. Machine can be repainted in original Cat colors at extra cost. Rear ripper can be supplied at extra cost. Inspections are welcome. 15 units available!

item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Delivered new in 2002, only 545 Hrs from new! Machine is in as-new condition, Low profile O-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean condition. Machine can be repainted in original Cat colors at extra cost. Rear ripper can be supplied at extra cost. Inspections are welcome. 15 units available!

Used for Demo / Training only, Caterpillar engine 147HP, machine is in as-new condition, Low profile E-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, new cutting edge, scarifier, new MS rear ripper fitted, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean and good condition. Operating and parts manual available with the machine.

Braden planetary dual brake lifting and deriking winch, 2 speed Rexroth hydr. piston motors, 19mm rope diameter, hydr. boom stop, anti-two block system, hydraulic joystick control, 3 side working range, can be transported in one load incl.
